0:
--------------------
Text: Fokienia is a genus of conifer tree belonging to the cypress family.
Triplets:<Fokienia
1:
--------------------
Text: Fokienia:  In its characteristics, "Fokienia" is intermediate between the genera of "Chamaecyparis" and "Calocedrus".
Triplets:<Fokienia
3:
--------------------
Text: Fokienia:  The genus comprises only one living species, Fokienia hodginsii or Fujian cypress (; Vietnamese: "Pơmu" ), and one fossil species ("Fokienia ravenscragensis").
Triplets:<Fokienia
